trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"></xref> event and for the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"> </xref> hendelsen, og den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: By default: - In the session authentication module (SAM) the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated> event is raised from within the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method after a session token (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) has been created.
trans-unit.target: Som standard: - modulen økten godkjenning (SAM) i <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>denne hendelsen oppstår fra innenfor den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden etter en øktstoken (<xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken>) har blitt opprettet.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SessionSecurityToken> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.OnAuthenticateRequest%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>

trans-unit.source: This happens, for example, if an event handler for the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived> event modifies the token.
trans-unit.target: Dette skjer, for eksempel hvis hendelsesbehandling for den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>hendelsen endrer tokenet.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenReceived>

trans-unit.source: You can use the SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs to modify the session token before it is passed further along the pipeline and is used to authenticate the entity making the request (user).
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs for å endre øktstoken før den sendes videre langs pipeline og brukes til å godkjenne enheten å sende forespørsel (bruker).

trans-unit.source: - In the WS-Federation authentication module (WSFAM), the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated> event is raised from the request processing pipeline just after a session token has been created from the WS-Federation sign-in response message received from the STS and just before the SAM is called to set the thread principal and write the session cookie.
trans-unit.target: -Modulen WS Federation godkjenning (WSFAM) i <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>denne hendelsen oppstår fra forespørselen som behandler pipelinen like etter at en øktstoken er opprettet fra WS Federation pålogging svarmelding mottatt fra STS og like før SAM kalles for å angi sikkerhetskontohaveren for tråd og skrive øktens informasjonskapsel.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.WSFederationAuthenticationModule.SessionSecurityTokenCreated>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A> property to modify or replace the token.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>til å endre eller erstatte tokenet.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A> to specify whether the session cookie should be written (or re-written).
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A>til å angi om øktens informasjonskapsel være skrevet (eller skrevet på nytt).</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.WriteSessionCookie%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs"></xref> class by using the specified session security token.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs"> </xref> klassen ved hjelp av den angitte økten sikkerhetskode.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A> property is set to the token specified by the `sessionToken` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>er satt til tokenet angitt av den `sessionToken` parameteren.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Services.SessionSecurityTokenCreatedEventArgs.SessionToken%2A>

trans-unit.source: The session security token that was created.
Gets or sets the session security token that was created.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir økten sikkerhetstokenet som ble opprettet.

trans-unit.source: The session token that was created.
Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a cookie should be written in the response.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om en informasjonskapsel må skrives i svaret.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to write a cookie in the response; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>å skrive en informasjonskapsel i svaret. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the cookie is not written in the response.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, informasjonskapselen er ikke skrevet i svaret.
